devdoc.author: @apoorvlathey
devdoc.details: This Zap must be excluded from the vault fees, as vault fees handled via custom logic here.

params.ethSpent: The amount of ETH spent in the buy
params.to: The user affected by the event

params.ethAmount: Amount of ETH returned to user
params.to: The user affected by the event
params.vTokenAmount: Amount of vToken returned to user

params.count: The number of tokens affected by the event
params.ethReceived: The amount of ETH received in the sell
params.to: The user affected by the event

params.ethSpent: The amount of ETH spent in the swap
params.to: The user affected by the event

params.executeCallData: Encoded calldata for Universal Router's `execute` function
params.idsOut: An array of any token IDs to be redeemed
params.to: The recipient of the token IDs from the tx
params.vaultId: The ID of the NFTX vault

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.executeCallData: Encoded calldata for Universal Router's `execute` function
params.idsIn: An array of token IDs to be deposited
params.to: The recipient of ETH from the tx
params.vaultId: The ID of the NFTX vault

params.executeCallData: Encoded calldata for Universal Router's `execute` function
params.idsIn: An array of token IDs to be deposited
params.to: The recipient of ETH from the tx
params.vaultId: The ID of the NFTX vault

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Marketplace Universal Router Zap

DustReturned(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Emitted when dust is returned after a transaction.

dustThreshold().notice: The vToken threshold below which dust is sent to InventoryStaking, else back to the user

pause(bool).notice: Allows our zap to be paused to prevent any processing.

swap1155(uint256,uint256[],uint256[],uin.notice: Swap idsIn to idsOut Send ETH along as well (via msg.value) to account for swap fees

swap721(uint256,uint256[],uint256[],addr.notice: Swap idsIn to idsOut Send ETH along as well (via msg.value) to account for swap fees

userdoc.notice: Marketplace Zap that utilizes Universal Router to facilitate the require token swaps
